title: configure error
body_html:
1. git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow
  2. cd tensorflow
  3. ./configure

Since our server has no GPU, we configure cuda option with no but error occurs by cuda.

ERROR: /home/kesl/kms_tensorflow/tensorflow/third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl:828:18: unexpected keyword 'environ' in call to repository_rule(implementation: function, *, attrs: dict or NoneType = None, local: bool = False). ERROR: com.google.devtools.build.lib.packages.BuildFileContainsErrorsException: error loading package '': Extension file 'third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl' has errors.

But if I configure same thing with branch r1.0 version, it works.
body_text:

cd tensorflow

Since our server has no GPU, we configure cuda option with no but error occurs by cuda.

ERROR: com.google.devtools.build.lib.packages.BuildFileContainsErrorsException: error loading package '': Extension file 'third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl' has errors. 
But if I configure same thing with branch r1.0 version, it works.
body:
1. git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow
2. cd tensorflow
3. ./configure

Since our server has no GPU, we configure cuda option with no but error occurs by cuda.

`ERROR: /home/kesl/kms_tensorflow/tensorflow/third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl:828:18: unexpected keyword 'environ' in call to repository_rule(implementation: function, *, attrs: dict or NoneType = None, local: bool = False).
ERROR: com.google.devtools.build.lib.packages.BuildFileContainsErrorsException: error loading package '': Extension file 'third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl' has errors.
` 

But if I configure same thing with branch r1.0 version, it works.
